channel.title: [PI] Dharok's Axe, Anim, help

item.title: [PI] Dharok's Axe, Anim, help
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

There are 4 ways to attack with Dh Axe:
Chop/Slash/Lunge/Block

  • My question is How i make the:

Chop + Slash + Block - The same anim?? (animid=2066)
And Lunge need it anim = 2067

This code may help you:

if(weaponName.contains("greataxe")) { if(c.fightMode == 2) { return 2066; } else { return 2067; } }

Read full topic
